channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How much will your vacation really cost? The scourge of dynamic pricing is spreading like wildfire
item.description: JetBlue set off a firestorm earlier this year when the airline announced it would begin dynamically pricing baggage fees. A first checked bag costs $4...

item.title: Wyndham’s newest budget extended-stay brand opens today in the US
item.description: U.S. travelers have a new option when it comes to the rapidly growing extended-stay hotel market. Wyndham’s newest brand, Echo Suites Extended Stay by...

item.title: How to earn and redeem Hilton Honors points at SLH properties
item.description: Hilton recently expanded its portfolio with the addition of roughly 400 Small Luxury Hotels of the World properties (which were formerly part of World...

item.title: Turkish Airlines releases new credit card: Another way to earn Miles&Smiles
item.description: If you’re a Turkish Airlines loyalist, there’s a new cobranded credit card that just hit the market for your consideration. Turkish Airlines has just ...

item.title: Copenhagen rewards eco-friendly travelers with free kayak tours, ice cream and more
item.description: Travelers to Copenhagen can soon pay for perks at some of the Danish capital’s coolest attractions by going for a bike ride, showing a train ticket an...
